message: I get out of bed and pick Ren up.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, what's wrong?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Oh, uh, I guess I was just wondering how you were feeling. I mean, we got dragged into Rhyme again... You doing okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "I detect no issues."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh. Should I examine you just to make sure?"

name: 蓮
message: "I believe I'm fine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, are you having trouble sleeping? You look exhausted."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well... It kinda feels like a whole bunch of stuff got dumped on me all at once."
I sit down cross-legged. Ren curls up in my lap and looks up at me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "There's a lot to deal with, but I think the one thing that's really weighing on me... is what happened to Mizuki."

name: 蓮
message: "Do you mean the possibility that you could have saved him, had you used your power correctly?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I just can't stop thinking about how maybe he'll never wake up. I can't get it out of my head."

name: 蓮
message: "Under the circumstances, I think it was effectively impossible for you to have picked the correct words at the time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know. I know that... but I just keep thinking there was a chance I could have saved him. I can't convince myself it wasn't my fault."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And on top of it all, now I remember doing Rhyme..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny... She said that my headaches were because of my power... that she's been giving me medicine to suppress it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I've always been good about taking her medicine, but now I have to wonder what would happen if I stopped."

name: 蓮
message: "Most likely, your headaches would get worse, and your power would manifest more apparently."

name: 蒼葉
message: "When you put it that way, I should probably take the medicine. Though you know, it hasn't been working as well as it used to."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And then those memories about Rhyme suddenly came back... Maybe I'm just overthinking it, but I have a really bad feeling about this."

name: 蓮
message: "I don't believe there's any basis to connect the two."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, I mean, it's just a gut feeling. But still, I can't shake it. Plus, even Toue seems to know something about me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What if it's something else I forgot? Or something I never knew in the first place?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yeah..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I absolutely want to stop whatever it is that Toue's up to... but I also want to find out what he knows about me too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is just another gut feeling, but I think he knows something really important."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I feel like I have to talk to him..."
Ren puts his paw on my knee when I've finished.

name: 蓮
message: "All the more reason to get some rest. We have a big day tomorrow."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're right."
I lift Ren and bring his forehead to mine.

name: 蒼葉
message: "One step at a time, huh? ...Thanks. I feel a little better now."

name: 蓮
message: "I'm glad."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, time for bed, I guess."
I crawl back into bed. Ren usually curls up by my feet, but this time he lies down by my face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Night."

name: 蓮
message: "Good night."
I stroke Ren's head, then slowly close my eyes.
